con:config.script:
Random rand = new Random() randNum = rand.nextInt(10000+1) // '100' can me change to any number...it is a max number value log.info(randNum)
String rn = Integer.toString(randNum) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RandomNumberGenerated", rn)

createPromoSailing
con:restRequest.con:request: {\r "header" : {\r "application" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#application}",\r "brand" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#brand}",\r "domainId" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#domainId}",\r "language" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#language}",\r "uuid" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#uuid}"\r },\r "promo" : {\r "promoId" : "${Properties#promoId 1}",\r "shipCode" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#shipCode}",\r "sailDate" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#sailDate}",\r "packageId" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#packageId}",\r "effectiveStartDate" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#effectiveStartDate}",\r "effectiveEndDate" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#effectiveEndDate}",\r "promoTypeId" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#promoTypeId}",\r "promoTypeDesc" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#promoTypeDesc}",\r "webLocationId" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#webLocationId}",\r "webLocationName" : "${DataSource - promoSailing#webLocationName}"\r }\r }

con:restRequest.name: updatePromoSailing
con:restRequest.con:request: { "header": { "application":"${DataSource - promoSailing#application}", "brand":"${DataSource - promoSailing#brand}", "domainId":"${DataSource - promoSailing#domainId}", "language":"${DataSource - promoSailing#language}", "uuid":"${DataSource - promoSailing#uuid}" }, "promo": { "promoId": "${Properties#promoId 2}", "shipCode": "${DataSource - promoSailing#shipCode}", "sailDate": "${DataSource - promoSailing#sailDate}", "packageId": "${DataSource - promoSailing#packageId}", "effectiveStartDate": "${DataSource - promoSailing#effectiveStartDate}", "effectiveEndDate": "${DataSource - promoSailing#effectiveEndDate}", "promoTypeId": "${DataSource - promoSailing#promoTypeId}", "promoSailingDesc": "${DataSource - promoSailing#updateDesciption}", "webLocationId": "${DataSource - promoSailing#webLocationId}" }, "previousPromotionId": "${Properties#promoId 1}", "previousStartDate": "${DataSource - promoSailing#effectiveStartDate}", "previousEndDate":"${DataSource - promoSailing#effectiveEndDate}" }
